data.text:
Jay Simons biography

Jay Simons serves as Independent Director of the Company since January 2017. Since 2011, Mr. Simons has served as president of Atlassian Corporation Plc. From 2008 to 2011, Mr. Simons was vice president of sales and marketing at Atlassian. From October 2005 to May 2008, Mr. Simons served in various roles, including vice president, marketing, at BEA Systems, Inc. an enterprise software company, which was acquired by Oracle Corporation in 2008. From 1998 to 2005, Mr. Simons served in various roles, including vice president, product marketing & strategy, at Plumtree Software, Inc., a web software company, which was acquired by BEA Systems, Inc. in 2005. Mr. Simons was selected to serve as a director on our Board due to his experience implementing a high-velocity, low-touch sales model, his experience moving to a multi-product platform and his experience with global expansion.

What is the salary of Jay Simons?

As the Independent Director of HubSpot Inc, the total compensation of Jay Simons at HubSpot Inc is $228,915. There are 12 executives at HubSpot Inc getting paid more, with Brian Halligan having the highest compensation of $4,153,970.

Insiders trading at HubSpot Inc

Over the last 10 years, insiders at HubSpot Inc have traded over $694,297,482 worth of HubSpot Inc stock and bought 55,024 units worth $8,666,585 . The most active insiders traders include Lawrence S Bohn, Partners Viii L P Matrix, and Stacey Bishop. On average, HubSpot Inc executives and independent directors trade stock every 9 days with the average trade being worth of $11,270,492. The most recent stock trade was executed by Brian Halligan on 16 July 2024, trading 8,500 units of HUBS stock currently worth $4,014,295.

What does HubSpot Inc do?

hubspot is the world’s leading inbound marketing and sales platform. since 2006, hubspot has been on a mission to make the world more inbound. today, 15,000+ customers in more than 90 countries use hubspot’s software, services, and support to transform the way they attract, engage, and delight customers. hubspot is headquartered in cambridge, ma with offices in dublin, ireland, and sydney, australia, and has been recognized by inc., forbes, and deloitte as one of the world’s fastest-growing companies. hubspot's software has helped companies worldwide change how they market and sell, while our innovative approach to company culture has helped redefine transparency and autonomy in the modern workplace. to learn more about hubspot's software, visit www.hubspot.com to join our team, visit hubspot.com/jobs
